title: Is the server down?
body: My client crashed, and when I try to turn it on, it says "update failed check the log". Is it cuz of the maintenance?

replies.body: Everything seems to be okay currently, but I'd like to help!  Assuming this is happening during the patcher, what % did it occur?  Any detailed information can help a lot.  Let me know!
Nvm I fixed it by deleting RADS>Solution>lol_game_client_sln. Thx reddit, and thank u for trying to help me.

Any chance a rioter is looking into the "Launch" bug that is going around? I have seen a few support forums posts and reddit posts, along with my own support ticket that don't have any fixes. This happened right before the last day of ranked. As soon as you click launch it just goes blank even with the process running in task manager. I can give you the support ticket number if that helps.

Sorry to hijack this with another bug. Idk if the two are related.
